SEARCH

Class Reservation

java.lang.Object
Reservation
public class Reservation extends Object
Responsible for handling all the data needed for a customer to reserve a hotel room

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private int
    checkIn
    Integer that indicates what day the guest will be checking in
    private int
    checkOut
    Integer that indicates what day the guest will be checking out
    private Room
    chosenRoom
    Room value that indicates which room the guest has chosen to stay in
    private String
    discountCode
    String value containing the inputted discount code, can contain an invalid code, but it will not do anything
    private String
    guestName
    String that contains the name of the guest for the reservation
    private boolean
    isDiscounted
    boolean value indicating whether the room has successfully been discounted
    private float
    pricePerNight
    Floating point value indicating the price per night for the reservation
    private float
    totalPrice
    Floating point value indicating the total price of the reservation

  • Constructor Details

    • Reservation

      public Reservation(String guestName, int checkIn, int checkOut, Room chosenRoom, String discountCode, float[] datePriceModifier)
      Constructor for the Reservation class
      Parameters:
      guestName - - name of the guest reserving a hotel room
      checkIn - - the day the guest will check-in to their hotel room
      checkOut - - the day the guest will check-out
      chosenRoom - - the room the guest will stay at
      discountCode - - string containing the possibly valid discount code
      datePriceModifier - - float array containing the price modifier for each individual date

    • checkDiscountCode

      public boolean checkDiscountCode(String discountCode)
      returns true if the discount code exists and false if it does not
      Parameters:
      discountCode - - the discount code to be checked
      Returns:
      1 if a discountCode exists and 0 if not

    • getDiscount

      public boolean getDiscount()
      Getter function for the boolean value isDiscounted
      Returns:
      the boolean value that represents whether the reservation is discounted
